resources.string: Kings Castle has crashed. Please send us the crash report so this problem can be fixed.
You have been disconnected due to inactivity
Unable to connect with the server, please retry later
Login Failed. Kings Castle requires google plus login to play.
You must have soldiers in your army to do this
You must have a barracks to do this.
Would you like to buy the %1$s for %2$s?
Would you like to buy a %1$s for %2$s?
Would you like to get some?
Would you like to sell %1$s and recover %2$s?
You must level your town center up to level
You cannot buy anymore of these.
Do you want to spend %1$s magic dust%2$s to finish %3$s now?

You have been invaded!\nThe gods have granted you temporary protection because you were successfully invaded(more than half your available resources were stolen) by another player.If you attack during this time the gods will take back their protection. They are not here to protect those who invade others.

You still have protection from the gods because you were attacked recently. The gods only protect the victums not the aggressors. If you attack someone now you will lose your protection. Sure you want to attack?
"Killing creatures you earn you resources.\nThey will respawn fairly regularly throughout the day."
When a building is selected you can move it by clicking on it and dragging it to another location.
Select one of these, then tap on the map.

To build walls tap the walls button then drag from one location to another to place the wall. Redrag if your not happy with the placement, Then accept using the "Build" button in the bottom right of the screen. If you cannot afford all of the walls only some will be placed
Does splash damage. Place where it where your enemies bottleneck to get the most benefit from it.

Your Town Center is the heart of your village. When your town center reaches a high enough level you can use it to advance to the next age. It stores most of your resources so make sure to keep it well protected.
Your Barracks trains soldiers which help block the path of your enemies.
Your Churches train magic and healing troops. As you level up your town center you will be allowed to level up your churches and the units it builds\n increasing their damage and healing.
Your basic archer tower. Decent rate of fire and decent damage. Upgrade it to increase its damage and rate of fire.
Your second defensive tower. Garrison archers inside to increase its firepower.
Your strongest defensive tower. Garrison archers inside to increase its firepower.
Basic Healing Shrines heal nearby soldiers.
Cheap way to get monsters to walk the path you want them to walk.
Farms are your main source of food. With each level they provide an extra 1 food per second.
Gold Mines are your main source of gold. Garrison a worker inside to start collecting. With every level they provide an extra 1 gold per worker per second.
Lumber Mills main source of wood. Garrison a worker inside to start collecting. With every level they provide an extra 1 wood per worker per second.
Storage Depots are drop off points for resources. Useful in the earlier ages before lumber mills and gold mines.
Bomb Traps are hidden from attackers until they are close. They are set on a 1 second fuse.
Spike Traps are hidden from attackers until they are right above them.
Workers collect resources and build buildings.\nThey will continue to collect and build even when your away so you can set them to work then check back later on.
Catapults are your main siege weapon that can only fire when stopped.
The %1$s is your basic melee soldier.
The %1$s is your medium melee soldier.
The %1$s is your upper melee soldier.
The %1$s is your advanced melee soldier.
The %1$s is your basic ranged soldier.
The %1$s is your medium ranged soldier.
The %1$s is your upper ranged soldier.
The %1$s is your advanced ranged soldier.
The %1$s is your basic healer. She will heal nearby soldiers when they are hurt.
Mages are your first offensive magic soldiers. They shoots fireballs and cast attack speed increasing buff spells on allies.
Elementalist shoot fireballs, lightning bolts and icicle spells.
Please set the %1$s constant and recompile the app.
Device is already registered on server.
From GCM: server deleted %1$d pending messages!
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on Demo Server.
From Demo Server: successfully added device!
From Demo Server: successfully removed device!
Could not register device on Demo Server after %1$d attempts.
Could not unregister device on Demo Server (%1$s).
There is a newer version available on the Google Play Store. You must update in order to play.
Basic arrow tower, upgrade it to increase its damage and rate of fire.
Fire burns through armor and ignites your foes which damages them for the next little while.
Freezes enemies slowing them down for your other towers to kill. Not effected by armor.
There was an issue with sign-in, please try again later.
